title: Everglades National Park: Gumbo Limbo Trail
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Hiking Trails     Pine Island Trails     Gumbo Limbo Trail                  Gumbo Limbo Trail      Plan Your Visit >> Things to Do >> Outdoor Activities >> Hiking Trails >> Pine Island Trails >> Current Page Trail Length:  0.4 miles (600 meters) round trip Wheelchair Accessible:  Yes Bicycles Allowed:  No Trail Description:  This self-guiding, paved trail meanders through a shaded, jungle-like hammock of gumbo limbo trees (Bursera simaruba), royal palms (Roystonea elata), ferns, and air plants.  Directions to Trail:  Starts from the Royal Palm Visitor Center, four miles (6 km) from the main park entrance/Ernest Coe Visitor Center.  Â     The flaky bark of a gumbo limbo tree
